name: Ali Aghababaei
title: AI Engineer • NLP Researcher • ML Developer
summary: AI/ML engineer with experience in NLP, model interpretability, and data-driven systems. Skilled in building machine-learning pipelines, developing deep-learning models, and creating full-stack applications. Passionate about explainable AI, large language models, and human-centered machine intelligence.

details: Developed interpretability workflows for transformer models (BERT, RoBERTa).
Applied Integrated Gradients to socio-psychological semantic markers.
Validated predictions using human-annotated datasets (Slurs, Twitter COVID).
Designed electrical installation layouts for transformer sites.
Collaborated with engineering teams and municipal authorities.

education.program: M.Sc. ICT for Internet and Multimedia
education.details: GPA 110/110 (Top 5%). Thesis on applying Integrated Gradients for NLP interpretability.

projects.title: Kuzushiji Script Classifier
projects.description: Built SVM and neural-network models to classify ancient Japanese cursive script.

projects.title: Image Repair via SIFT Patch Matching
projects.description: Restored corrupted images using custom C + OpenCV implementations.

projects.title: Fashion-MNIST Classifier
projects.description: Developed a neural network to classify 10 fashion categories.

projects.title: Full-Stack Bookstore Web App
projects.description: Created an online bookstore with frontend and backend components.

publications.title: Explainability of Transformer Models via Integrated Gradients
Artificial Intelligence in Agro-Food Systems: From Farm to Fork
